alert.note: Alert for Ochoco-John Day Highlands (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:08PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Deschutes County through 600 PM PDT... At 508 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Millican, or 14 miles southeast of Bend, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millican and Brothers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
